Our Mission to Create Safer Spaces

SpeakUpHer is dedicated to empowering individuals to report harassment safely and confidentially

Our Story

Founded in 2025 in Jordan, SpeakUpHer emerged from a pressing need to address workplace and public harassment. Our team of technologists, legal experts, and social activists came together to create a platform that makes reporting harassment simple, secure, and effective.

What started as a university project has grown into a movement, helping thousands find their voice against harassment.

); }; export default AboutPage;
